overview.en: AdEx Network (ADX) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. AdEx Network has a current supply of 122,228,860.79700965 with 115,086,384.45700964 in circulation. The last known price of AdEx Network is 1.08149955 USD and is down -10.96 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 20 active market(s) with $15,497,380.73 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.adex.network/.
